name: NJOY, INC.
description: manufactures, distributes and sells electronic cigarettes
sampleDescriptions: advocate against imposition of vaping tax in connection with proposed Reconciliation Bill
Advocate against inclusion of "vaping tax" in Build Back Better bill.
Advocate in support of HR 6286, "Clarifying Authority Over Nicotine Act of 2021," as a standalone bill, and alternatively for inclusion in HR 2471, "Consolidated Appropriations Act of 2022".
Advocate in support of implementation and forthcoming enforcement of HR 6286, "Clarifying Authority Over Nicotine Act of 2021," as became contained and enacted by way of Public Law No. 117-103
